createCompany.description: Create a new company in your Folk workspace. You can add emails, links, phone numbers, and assign it to a group.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the company

props.name: description
props.description: A short description of the company

props.name: industry
props.description: The industry the company operates in

props.name: addresses
props.description: Physical addresses for the company. The first address is primary.

props.name: emails
props.description: Email addresses for the company. The first email is primary.

props.name: phones
props.description: Phone numbers for the company. The first phone is primary.

props.name: urls
props.description: Website URLs for the company. The first URL is primary.

createPerson.description: Create a new person in your Folk workspace. You can link them to a company, add contact details, and assign to a group.

props.name: firstName
props.description: The first name of the person

props.name: lastName
props.description: The last name of the person

props.name: fullName
props.description: The full name of the person (alternative to first/last)

props.name: description
props.description: A short description of the person

props.name: birthday
props.description: The birthday in YYYY-MM-DD format

props.name: jobTitle
props.description: The job title of the person

props.name: companyNames
props.description: The names of companies to associate with the person. The first company will be primary.

props.name: addresses
props.description: Physical addresses for the person. The first address is primary.

props.name: emails
props.description: Email addresses for the person. The first email is primary.

props.name: phones
props.description: Phone numbers for the person. The first phone is primary.

props.name: urls
props.description: Website URLs for the person. The first URL is primary.

findCompany.description: Search for companies in your Folk workspace by name or email address.

props.name: query
props.description: Enter company name or email to search for

findPerson.description: Retrieve a paginated list of people in your Folk workspace with optional filtering.

props.name: limit
props.description: The number of items to return (1-100)

props.name: cursor
props.description: A cursor for pagination. Use the nextLink value from a previous response.

props.name: combinator
props.description: The logical operator to combine multiple filters

props.name: nameFilter
props.description: Filter by person name (contains)

props.name: emailFilter
props.description: Filter by email address (contains)

getCompany.description: Retrieve detailed information about a company from your Folk workspace.

getPerson.description: Retrieve detailed information about a person from your Folk workspace.
